name: SPOF: Single Point Of Failure
description:
SPOF: Single Point Of Failure is a strategy-simulation game where you must keep the internet alive by building servers across the world, fixing them when they are attacked or go faulty... Do you have what it takes to maintain a secure, world-wide server network? Or will the world's largest source of knowledge succumb to hackers and poor maintenance?

Made for Ludum Dare #46

NOTE: Hotfix for those who get a DLL error, have rebuilt the game with the DLLs linked properly (and added the DLLs to the zip as well just in case)
